customer_reviews.title: Great for game day use!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Most comfortable gloves I have ever purchased -Natural feel on your hands -Provide good grip -Cool design Cons -Don't know if they will hold up to rigorous batting practice -The back side that provides comfort and fit is made of a spandex material that could wear down easier than leather Overall I love these gloves, I would just them for game use over practice sessions. Get yourself a cheap pair of less flashy eastons for those long BP sessions, and leave these babies for raking on game day!
customer_reviews.author: xINSAINOx

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy batting gloves online because of the fit but these worked out great. They fit perfectly and after over a month of use I've had no issues with any tearing or ripping (I pull on my gloves A LOT, weird habit I have). The only thing I didn't expect was the red dye from my bat to transfer to the white on the palm of the gloves...I've only ever used black batting gloves so I didn't know that would happen. So, regardless of how old your bat may be (mine is over a year old), keep in mind that color of the tape on your bat could transfer to the white of the palms
